name: Sails User API
tagline: A SailsJS basic API for Create, Authenticate and Authorize users
body:
### About
A [SailsJS](http://sailsjs.org) API for Create, Authenticate and Authorize users on your server. It uses the JSONWebToken. 

### Features
 - Token based Authentication.
 - Authorization via Policies.
 - MongoDB ready.

### Status
